name: Parasite (itch) (Speed / Lucas, MaximeA, Aymeric Goes, SariusSkelrets)
name_original: Parasite (itch) (Speed / Lucas, MaximeA, Aymeric Goes, SariusSkelrets)
description:
**THE GAME IS MORE ENJOYABLE WITH A CONTROLLER !🎮**

Welcome to a calm and happy country 🌄.

You are a beautiful and cute parasite worm called "Mr. Wigglesworth", and you are the happiest worm on the entire planet. You have great values, like peace, kindness, and open-mindedness. You excel in social life, and you are a parent of two beautiful children.
But today, you are thirsty, and you need to break some of your values. Your mind says "Give me blood", and you must listen to him if you want to survive.

Go and decapitate the humans and feel free of your mind!
